name: Wallos
longDescription:
Wallos is a self-hostable web application designed to help you manage and track your subscriptions and recurring payments. It provides comprehensive features for subscription management, multi-currency support, and financial tracking.

Key features include subscription management, category organization, multi-currency support with currency conversion, customizable notifications, statistics and graphs, and a mobile-friendly interface.

Your financial data remains private and secure on your own server with this self-hosted solution.
description: Open-source personal subscription tracker and manager
